lemma show_law_ratfps [show_law_simps]:
  "shows_prec p (a :: 'a ratfps) (r @ s) = shows_prec p a r @ s"
translations:
lemma show_law_ratfps [show_law_simps]:
  "shows_prec p (a :: 'a ratfps) (r @ s) = shows_prec p a r @ s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. shows_prec p a (r @ s) = shows_prec p a r @ s

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. OFCLASS('a ratfps, show_class)
